description: Create a HomeComponent that is shown when the application is first loaded. It has a center div that displays the name of the application "On Device Blog Translation with Gemma" at the center. It has a description to describe the purpose of the app and a link to navigate to the TranslateComponent. The routerLink the Translate of the component is translate-blog and please update it in relevant track. Moreover, router.ts must be updated to redirect to the HomeComponent when the path is "/", "/home", or "**". For "/", the pathMatch must be full.
